replacements.title: Replacements
replacements.description: Describes the dynamic replacements available/required for this request

url.title: Url
url.description: Where to send the request, including any query string and anchor.

method.title: Method
method.description: The request method; can also be a replacement placeholder.

headers.title: Headers
headers.description: The headers to send for this request. Note that additional auto-generated headers, such as Content-Length and Content-Type, may also be sent.

text.title: Text
text.description: The raw body of this request, if applicable.

data.title: Data
data.description: The form data of this request, if applicable.

json.title: Json
json.description: The JSON data of this request, if applicable.

exports.title: Exports
exports.description: Path specs for variables to export from the response.

name.title: Name
name.description: The name of this replacement, which will be used to find it in the input or environment variables; defaults to the replacement string
